reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and flattering on curvy frames, with one noting its classy low-cut front. The dress is comfortable, not see-through, and one customer mentions it's perfect for the price. The fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding it perfect while others say it's too short, and the material quality is criticized for being cheap like Halloween spandex. Several customers report an unpleasant smell. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and Sexy Dress!
items.body: This dress looks amazing on! Lots of compliments from others when wearing it. It is soft, very comfortable and the perfect length for me. I am 5â€™2 and 130 pounds and bought a small fits perfect true to size. The dress is a 2 inches above my knee. I did not have to wear a bra with it ( I am a 34DD). Read more
items.author: Lora A Merrill

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars fits snug and shows the curves
items.author: Frosty

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress! Very low cut and short
items.body: Cute dress with lots of stretch. Good material and not see through. Bought this for a trip to Vegas. Definitely skimpier than I would normally wear at my age but was looking for something to make the hubby stop in his tracks. Went a size down when i ordered cause I planned to lose weight to get into it as motivation. I would say true to size. I normally would have purchased a medium but took a gamble on getting a small. I'm still hoping to lose a little more weight before my trip to hopefully gain some more length in the dress. Either way I think my husband will Iike this dress. I am 5'2" and 140lbs. I would say when ordering take your height into account cause I'm only 5'2" and this dress is short! Read more
items.author: Crystal Maribito

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: The dress is beautiful but when I opened the package it smells like perfume or something not sure what it is Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Love the dress. True to size and comfortable. Washed well. I came back and bought other colors. Read more
items.author: AA1995

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smells of smoke; probably got a resold return. Otherwise really pretty
items.body: I dont think it was the fault of the seller at all, but the item I received was most likely a resold return. It smells of smoke so I might have to return it and get another one if I cant wash the smell out. Im very sensitive to this sort of thing so I definitely do not appreciate getting an item in this condition. But besides the smoke smell being unpleasant, the dress is really pretty. Im not a small girl and I definitely do not like how my stomach looks in tight dresses, but this dress was not bad. It is a little shorter than expected, which is not a bad thing, but I definitely need to adjust my shaper so it doesnt show from under the dress. I am wearing this dress for a cosplay (Kalifa from One Piece). Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck Ruched Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck Ruched Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Navy, White, Burgundy, Royalblue, Black, Camel. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
